# Preset variables:
library(stats)
X <- c(1,2,3)

# The code:
sum1 <- 10 + 9 + 8
hometown <- "St. Louis"
v1 <- X + 10
what_is_pi <- function() {pi}
squared <- function(x) {
   t <- x^2
   return(t)
}
imperial_to_metric <- function(feet, inches) {
   total_inches <- feet * 12 + inches
   meters <- total_inches * 0.0254
   return(meters)
}
